verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of Solomon.) <S%H518>Unless<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1129>builds<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> They <S%H5998>labor<s%> in <S%H7723>vain<s%> who <S%H1129>build<s%> it; <S%H518>Unless<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8104>guards<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> The <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H8245>keeps<s%> <S%H8245>awake<s%> in <S%H7723>vain.<s%>

It is <S%H7723>vain<s%> for you to <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early,<s%> To <S%H3427>retire<s%> <S%H309>late,<s%> To <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6089>painful<s%> <S%H6089>labors;<s%> For He <S%H5414>gives<s%> to His <S%H3039>beloved<s%> [even in his] <S%H8142>sleep.<s%>
<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> are a <S%H5159>gift<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> The <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H990>womb<s%> is a <S%H7939>reward.<s%>
Like <S%H2671>arrows<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H1368>warrior,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of one's <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H827>quiver<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of them; They shall not be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> they <S%H1696>speak<s%> with their <S%H340>enemies<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>
